      void displayPossibleActions​(boolean myTurn, boolean mainActionDone)
      Displays all possible actions in GUI
      Parameters:
      myTurn - set true if it's the player's turn
      mainActionDone - set true if the main action has already done in this turn

    • displayPickResourceMenu

      void displayPickResourceMenu​(MarbleSelection selection, java.util.ArrayList<Marble> selected, java.util.ArrayList<ClientLeaderCard> changeEffects, java.util.ArrayList<ClientLeaderCard> depotEffects)
      Displays pick resources screen in UI
      Parameters:
      selection - selected marble market row / column orientation
      selected - selected marbles from the market
      changeEffects - list of optional conversions for white marbles
      depotEffects - list of activated leader cards with depot effects

    • displayBuyDevelopmentCardMenu

      void displayBuyDevelopmentCardMenu​(java.lang.String id, java.util.ArrayList<ClientLeaderCard> discounts, java.util.ArrayList<ClientLeaderCard> depotEffects)
      Displays buy development card screen in UI
      Parameters:
      id - card id that player wants to buy
      discounts - list of activated leader cards that have a discount effect
      depotEffects - list of activated leader cards with depot effects

    • displayProduceMenu

      void displayProduceMenu​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientLeaderCard> effects, java.util.ArrayList<ClientLeaderCard> depotEffects)
      Displays production screens in UI
      Parameters:
      effects - list of activated leader cards that have a production effect
      depotEffects - list of activated leader cards that have a depot effect

    • startUI

      Initializes the UI with information provided by client game
